# a game whose aim is to answer yes-or-no questions without saying "yes" or "no"
types.html:
ni oui ni non m (uncountable)

  1. a game whose aim is to answer yes-or-no questions without saying "yes" or "no"
trans: a game whose aim is to answer yes-or-no questions without saying "yes" or "no"
a game whose aim is to answer yes-or-no questions without saying "yes" or "no"

title: ni oui ni non
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ni wi ni nɔ̃/
